entry_condition_summary: Enter when close < lowest low of previous 5 bars, indicating potential oversold reversal
primary_exit_logic: Exit when close > high[1] showing price strength
notes: Simple mean reversion on 5-bar lows. Works on any timeframe. High frequency of signals in volatile markets. Best for stocks/ETFs/futures.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when close < lowest low of previous 3 bars, with optional EMA filter
primary_exit_logic: Exit when close > highest high of previous 7 bars
notes: Faster signals than 5-bar low. Asymmetric entry/exit windows (3 bars in, 7 bars out). Works on any timeframe from intraday to daily.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when: 1) previous bar bearish, 2) current open < prior low (gap down), 3) current close > open (bullish reversal)
primary_exit_logic: Exit when close > highest high of previous 7 bars
notes: Capitalizes on gap down exhaustion. Requires true gap below prior low. Best on timeframes with gaps (daily, 1HR+). Works in high volatility.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when security (TLT default) crosses above its SMA, indicating trend reversal to uptrend
primary_exit_logic: Exit when security crosses below its SMA
notes: Rotation strategy between equities (SPY) and bonds (TLT). Trend-following crossover. Works on any timeframe. Best in trending markets. NOT optimized per author.

strategy_name: Turn of the Month Strategy on Steroids
entry_condition_summary: Enter when day of month >= threshold (default 25) AND close < close[1], exploiting turn-of-month effect
notes: Exploits calendar anomaly - stocks tend to rise end of month. Mean reversion entry with RSI exit. Requires daily bars for calendar tracking.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when close < lower Bollinger Band (2σ) AND IBS indicates oversold conditions
notes: Combines volatility (BB) with intrabar strength (IBS) for double confirmation. Exits on IBS overbought. Best in mean-reverting markets. Timeframe agnostic.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when IBS < threshold (default 0.2), meaning close near bar's low
notes: Pure IBS mean reversion. IBS = (close-low)/(high-low). Simple calculation, no warmup needed. Best in ranging markets. Works on any timeframe.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when close < reference close (N bars ago) for at least N consecutive bars, indicating sustained bearish move
primary_exit_logic: Exit when close > high[1] confirming reversal
notes: Momentum exhaustion strategy. Requires sustained selling before entry. Reference close lookback customizable. Works on any timeframe from intraday to daily.

entry_condition_summary: Enter after N consecutive bars where close[i] < close[i-1] (default 3), identifying momentum exhaustion
notes: Simple consecutive down bar counter. More flexible than 4-bar momentum. Timeframe agnostic. Best in volatile markets with frequent swings.

strategy_name: Consecutive Bars Above/Below EMA Buy the Dip Strategy
entry_condition_summary: Enter when close remains below selected MA (SMA or EMA) for N consecutive bars (default 3), identifying dip
notes: MA-based dip buying. Customizable MA type and length. Counts consecutive bars below MA. Works on any timeframe when price oscillates around short-term MA.

strategy_name: Average High-Low Range + IBS Reversal Strategy
entry_condition_summary: Enter when: 1) close below (upper - 2.5×avg_HL_range) for N bars (default 2), 2) IBS < threshold (default 0.2)
notes: Combines volatility measure (avg high-low range) with IBS. Avg_HL = SMA(high-low, 20). Identifies extreme deviations. Works on any timeframe.

entry_condition_summary: Enter after N consecutive down closes (default 3), with optional 200 EMA filter
primary_exit_logic: Exit after N consecutive up closes (default 3)
notes: Symmetric entry/exit logic. Simple consecutive close counter. Optional trend filter improves reliability. Works on any timeframe. Best in oscillating/volatile markets. NOT optimized.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when consecutive bars of close < low[1] reaches threshold (default 3), indicating overextended bearish move
notes: Contrarian strategy for overextended bearish moves. Counts aggressive down bars where each close breaks prior low. Works on any timeframe from intraday to daily.

strategy_name: ATR Buy the Dip Mean Reversion
entry_condition_summary: Enter when close < smoothed ATR lower trigger (close - ATR×multiplier smoothed), indicating oversold
notes: ATR-based oversold detection. Dynamic lower threshold = SMA(close - ATR×mult, smooth_period). Enters on extreme dips below volatility-adjusted level. Timeframe agnostic.

entry_condition_summary: Enter when IBS <= 0.1 (close near bar's low), indicating extreme oversold
notes: More extreme version of IBS strategy #46. Uses lower threshold (0.1 vs 0.2) for fewer but higher-conviction signals. Works on any timeframe for stocks/ETFs/futures.

strategy_name: 10 Bar High Breakout with Low IBS
entry_condition_summary: Enter when: 1) high > highest(high, 10) breaking out to new high, 2) low IBS (default <= 0.15) for pullback confirmation
notes: Breakout strategy with pullback confirmation. New 10-bar high with low IBS suggests consolidation before breakout. Combines momentum with mean reversion filter. Works on any timeframe.
